BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 040143 PQK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the acquisition of real property located at 741 Flushing Avenue, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34, for use as a day care center and senior center.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 357, LP – 2154, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the 35-34 Bell Boulevard, located at northwest corner of Bell Boulevard and 3a6th Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 19, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055122 HKQ).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 357, LP – 2157, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Hamilton-Holly House , located at 4 St Mark's Place, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 2, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055119 HKM).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 040143 PQK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the acquisition of real property located at 741 Flushing Avenue, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34, for use as a day care center and senior center.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Laid Over by Subcommittee

Items.Title: Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL – 357, LP – 2154, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the 35-34 Bell Boulevard, located at northwest corner of Bell Boulevard and 3a6th Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 19, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20055122 HKQ).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
